backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor placeholder with no logic.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report linking a homepage text-color update to affected files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries for various frontend files used for reference.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles defining extensive OKLCH color variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app wiring TanStack Router routes and global Brand and Cart providers.
frontend/src/cart/CartProvider.tsx: Cart context managing items, quantities, persistence, and total price calculation.
frontend/src/components/BottomNav.tsx: Mobile bottom navigation bar with route highlighting and cart badge.
frontend/src/components/BrandProvider.ts: Brand context storing editable brand name and logo with localStorage persistence.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Responsive header with logo upload, editable brand name, and navigation menu.
frontend/src/components/ProductCard.tsx: Product card showing image, price, quantity control, and add‑to‑cart behavior.
A horizontal scrollable carousel rendering ProductCard components with left and right navigation buttons.
frontend/src/data/products.ts: Defines the Product interface and exports arrays of thepla and other product data along with category names.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor based on Internet Identity using React Query and invalidates dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for managing Internet Identity auth state and login/logout behavior.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup with custom color variables, dark mode theming, and utility rules including scrollbar hiding.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider and renders the root component.
frontend/src/pages/AccountPage.tsx: Displays a guest account page with profile info and links to contact, FAQ, and placeholder sections.
frontend/src/pages/CartPage.tsx: Renders the shopping cart with quantity controls, item removal, totals, and an empty‑cart fallback.
frontend/src/pages/CategoriesPage.tsx: Shows product categories using thepla data and other products, each rendered through a ProductCarousel.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Renders a contact page with phone, location, email, and Instagram input sections using React state for email and Instagram fields.
frontend/src/pages/FaqPage.tsx: Displays a list of FAQs with expandable answers using local state to toggle open items.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Implements the homepage with a hero section, buy-now logic adding a default product to the cart, and a brand story section.
frontend/src/pages/NotificationsPage.tsx: Shows a list of static notifications with icons, titles, messages, and timestamps.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining theme colors, typography, animations, and plugins for styling the app.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata including features, new requests, issues, and configuration state.
